item: English:

Added Lua script function to run user-defined scripts. Users can copy the script to the U disk and run it in the device, and observe the running process and results through the device screen. And zoom size.
中文：
新增了LUA脚本功能，可以运行用户自定义的脚本。用户可以把脚本拷贝到U盘内，然后在设备中运行，并通过设备屏幕观察运行过程和结果。同时可以放大和缩小。
English:
Fixed a bug that prompted abnormal parameters during card simulation.
Added dump file browsing function.  After selecting a file, you can write or simulate.
Added staticnested fast decryption.  Enjoy it :)
中文：
修复了某些卡模拟提示参数异常的BUG。
增加了卡包列表功能，支持从卡包选择数据写卡或者模拟卡。
增加了StaticNested快速解密的支持，去享受吧。
English:
The stability of OTA is optimized.
Fixed bug that ICLASS Elite could not read.
Optimized and fixed different version of ICLASS cards write functionality compatibility.
中文：
优化了OTA的稳定性。
修复了部分ICLASS Elite无法读取的bug。
优化了ICLASS写卡兼容性。
English:
Fixed possible freeze when writing 14a tags.
Improvement to tag writing increasing the success rate when writing card.
Added funcitonality of writing NFC data to smartwatch and mobile phone.
中文：
修复写14A卡片时可能会卡死的问题。
优化了写卡的逻辑，提高写卡的成功率。
添加了自动写 手环/手表/手机 的专项写卡功能。
English:
Fixed the inconsistency between text and audio when writing 14a tag.
Fix the frozen bug at OTA.
Fine tune the system clock to improve the accuracy of the clock.
中文：
修复写14A卡片时，提示文本和音频不一致的问题
修复OTA可能会卡死的问题
微调系统时钟，提升时钟的精确度。
English:
Fixed the error of 0x05 when installing ipk (installation of hidden files is not allowed)
Fixed the problem that the system time goes too fast.
Fixed the problem of can't set year.
中文：
修复了部分用户安装IPK时一直报0x05的问题。（禁止安装隐藏文件）
修复了系统时钟走太快的问题。
修复了无法手动设置年份的问题。
English:
The 'ICS Decoder' supported.
System time set supported, the tag data file will have the correct creation time
Automatic current limit supported, (Fix compatibility issues when connecting to some laptop)
Fix the bug that connect OTG will cause the device to lag.
Fix the bug that set time.
中文：
ICS 外置读卡器已添加支持。
系统时间设置支持，设置后读卡数据将会有正确的创建时间
电脑模式下电流自动限制，以此解决某些笔记本电脑的兼容性问题。
修复某些情况下，插入OTG会导致设备卡顿的问题。
修复手动设置时间的一些BUG。
English:
`TERMINUS` Tag reader bug fixed.
Erase tag supported.
Check keys timeout bug fixed.
中文：
兼容多种容量的特斯联标签读写。
清卡功能支持已添加。
修复检测M1卡秘钥时容易超时的问题。
English:
`TERMINUS` Tag read and write supported.
The warning audio of main page disable.
Optimized for t55xx sniffing, invalid keys will now be displayed.
Fix the problem that t55xx sniff could not be forced to stop.
Simplify some English button text.
中文：
新增一种可复制卡，特斯联。
主页面单击电源键的报错音被禁用了。
优化T55XX嗅探，新增显示所有秘钥，包含无效秘钥，可方便调整嗅探时机。
修复T55XX嗅探无法强制结束的问题。
简化某些英文按钮文本
English:
The key is also saved when reading the M1 magic tag(gen1a).
The problem of too long countdown of M1 check keys is optimized
Solve the problem of repeated cracking of the same reader and the same keys in a region.
Add a egg, and you can find it on the about page.
中文：
在读取UID后门卡时也进行秘钥保存。
优化了M1卡检查已知秘钥时，倒计时过长的问题
现在破解成功的卡都会往用户秘钥文件里面添加，默认会进行扫描，增加了全加密解卡的成功率。
去吧，我们有个彩蛋等你搜索，在关于界面。
Some bugs fixed.
Some UI is optimized.
T5577 auto sniff keys added.(Old 125k Sniff)
FDX tag simulation bug fixed.
Lf reader crash bug fixed.
Other bugs fixed...
Some bugs fixed.
Sniff keys lost bug fixed.
IOprox special uid crash bug fixed.
Pyramid fc unknow crash bug fixed.
iClass reader bug fixed.
Mifare reader enhanced.
PC-MODE connection dead bug fixed.
Read some tag have timer.
Auto mass storage fix tool added.
Auto mass storage clear tool added
Some reader bug fixed.
Added some small games(Easter egg).
Volume control implement.
Some reader bug fixed.
PC-MODE implement.
Backlight implement.
Tag Reader implement.
Tag Sniff implement.
Tag simulation implement.
Project rebuild.
